# ionet

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/Carol-seven/ionet/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Carol-seven/ionet/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `ionet` is to develop network functionalities specialized for the data generated from input-output tables.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `ionet` from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Carol-seven/ionet")
```
